rooms.description: Spacious colonial-style living area with high ceilings and natural light
Elegant dining space integrated with the living room
Modern kitchen with colonial touches, efficient layout for cooking and dining prep
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom emphasizing privacy and luxury
Secondary bedroom with traditional colonial details

openings.description: Colonial-style gateway with wrought iron detailing
Wooden front door with colonial motifs
Large colonial windows ensuring ample natural light
